BackstoryDef.title: Serial cleaner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had the job of cleaning up after a urbworld mob. Eventually though, [PAWN_nameDef] became too much of a liability to be left alive. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to smuggle [PAWN_objective]self onto a ship to escape, but [PAWN_pronoun] still watches over [PAWN_possessive] shoulder.

BackstoryDef.title: Astronaut
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an urbworld space program. Due to malfunctionioning equipment they were left stranded in space. Many years later they would be released from cryosleep on a far away planet.

BackstoryDef.title: sleeping beauty
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s cryptosleep casket was found on an undeveloped world. People from around this world would come to admire [PAWN_possessive] beauty. After someone managed to unlock the casket, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to flee from [PAWN_possessive] admirers. [PAWN_nameDef] has gotten used to being waited on hand and foot.

BackstoryDef.title: Oldworlder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was preserved using an early form of cryptosleep to save them from a then uncurable disease. After being revived and cured of the disease, [PAWN_nameDef] was given an enormous medical bill by the megacorp that revived them and [PAWN_pronoun] has been running ever since.

BackstoryDef.title: Overseer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had the job of managing an organization that prevented the population of an urbworld from knowing about otherworldly forces. [PAWN_nameDef] had successfully neutralized anything from animal-maddening psychic devices to bald humanoids with elongated fingers, and did so under the organizations motto of secure, capture, and destroy.

BackstoryDef.title: Xenotechnician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for thousands of successful vatbirths. [PAWN_nameDef] eventually lost [PAWN_possessive] job after taking [PAWN_possessive] experiments too far.

BackstoryDef.title: Shaman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well respected shaman among [PAWN_possessive] people. They were able to cure a variety of aliments using knowledge gained from their "skyparents".

BackstoryDef.title: Hippie
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran with a counterculture crowd on an urbworld planet. After the group irritated the local junklord with their peaceful protests, they had little choice but to flee to the stars.

BackstoryDef.title: Stocktrader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a successful stock trading firm. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to outperform most of [PAWN_possessive] department through constant consumption of Wake Up and Yayo, which [PAWN_nameDef]'s employer took a blind eye to. [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] job after taking part in a "random" chemical test, though [PAWN_pronoun] suspects [PAWN_pronoun] was chosen due to office politics.

BackstoryDef.title: Handyman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always handy around the house. [PAWN_pronoun] even had a show about reparing things around the house called "[PAWN_nameDef]'s Improvements". [PAWN_nameDef]'s catchphrase on the show was "ooh-AH".

BackstoryDef.title: Wrestler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a popular wrestler on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. Even after retiring, [PAWN_nameDef] still feels the need to smash furniture over someone's head.

BackstoryDef.title: Show Host
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the host of the "[PAWN_nameDef] Show", where [PAWN_pronoun] would make fun of [PAWN_possessive] guests and try to capitalize on trends. This was until one of [PAWN_possessive] guests burned down the studio. [PAWN_nameDef] was lucky to escape with [PAWN_possessive] life.

BackstoryDef.title: President
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was elected president of an urbworld country. During a war on said urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] pushed a big red button that activated the country's nuclear arsenal. After activating the button, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] cabinet escaped to the stars.

BackstoryDef.title: Relic collector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] collects ancient technnology left behind. Someday, [PAWN_pronoun] hopes to know what it all does.

BackstoryDef.title: Junklord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leader on a post apocalyptic planet. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] slaves to find valuable scrap and equipment. After the slaves found an ancient stock of weaponry while scavenging, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to flee from an armed rebellion.

BackstoryDef.title: Homesteader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] life preparing for the worst. [PAWN_pronoun] always kept [PAWN_possessive] shotgun nearbuy to keep miscreants away from [PAWN_possessive] daughter.

BackstoryDef.title: Psychite Oracle
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a what some would call "instinct", being able to almost know what is going to happen. When [PAWN_nameDef] started taking chems, that instinct became vivid visions of the future. Since [PAWN_pronoun] discovered this, [PAWN_pronoun] has been using [PAWN_possessive] abilities to the detriment of [PAWN_possessive] health.

BackstoryDef.title: Technophobe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely sensitive to electromagnetic radiation, or atleast [PAWN_pronoun] believes [PAWN_pronoun] is. Oddly enough, [PAWN_nameDef]'s reactions to electromagnetism is dependent on [PAWN_objective] noticing it is nearby.

BackstoryDef.title: Imposter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s research team discovered a strange creature that could take human form. The research team put a vote to destroy [PAWN_nameDef] under the belief [PAWN_pronoun] was the creature, which forced [PAWN_objective] to escape. Now far from that planet, [PAWN_nameDef] hopes that they picked the wrong one.

BackstoryDef.title: Android
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a job pretending to be an android so advanced they were indistinguishable from a human. During this time, [PAWN_pronoun] picked up some skills from [PAWN_possessive] "creator". Eventually, people stopped buying the ruse, but [PAWN_nameDef] can still do a sick robot dance.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld patriot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] believes in [PAWN_possessive] country's values, even after going to a far off rimworld. [PAWN_nameDef] fought in three wars and can sing [PAWN_possessive] country's national anthem forwards and backwards.

BackstoryDef.title: Scrap Artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is skilled at making art from what others would call trash. Not everyone gets what [PAWN_nameDef] is trying to convey, but they can all apreciate [PAWN_possessive] skill at the craft.

BackstoryDef.title: Wastepacker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't the shapest tool in the shed. [PAWN_pronoun] got a job moving toxic wastepacks. While it probably shortened [PAWN_possessive] lifespan, it paid rather well.

BackstoryDef.title: Thrall
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a willing bloodbag for a powerful hemeophage. The "vampire" taught [PAWN_objective] how to cure the sick, but they probably just wanted to keep their bloodbags healthy.

BackstoryDef.title: Prisoner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a prisoner on an urbworld planet,but managed to escape using some bedsheets and a razor blade.

BackstoryDef.title: Xenogerm Model
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a job modeling the effects of xenogerms for wealthy clients. Repeated xenogerm implantations has left [PAWN_nameDef] with a damaged immunity system and a deluded sense of grandeur, but [PAWN_pronoun] did catch some of the details about the xenogerms [PAWN_pronoun] was modeling.

BackstoryDef.title: Data Smuggler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On advanced worlds where stolen data can be easily detected, smugglers download data into their own brains to avoid detection. [PAWN_nameDef] was lauded for being able to carry large data packets in [PAWN_possessive] brain.

BackstoryDef.title: Meat Vendor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known to travel the polluted wastes selling meat on a stick. Few know how [PAWN_nameDef] obtained the meat, and the ones that do could never tell the tale.

BackstoryDef.title: Amnesiac wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: No one [PAWN_nameDef] has met knows who [PAWN_nameDef] was before [PAWN_pronoun] lost [PAWN_possessive] memory, but [PAWN_pronoun] remains determined to find out. [PAWN_nameDef]'s travels have led them to acquire various miscellaneous skills, but [PAWN_nameDef] cannot remember what learned in school, or if they even went.

BackstoryDef.title: Park Mascot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to work at an urbworld amusement park as an animal mascot. [PAWN_nameDef] got to be pretty good at interacting with the kids, but had to fight off the teenagers who thought pushing [PAWN_objective] over was funny.

BackstoryDef.title: Renegade
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought against the empire's attempts to spread across space, while [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] band of rebels were not entirely successful, the war taught [PAWN_nameDef] many things.

BackstoryDef.title: Venom soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mercenary soldier augmented with various toxin based augmentations. Intergalactic transport law required the removal of [PAWN_nameDef]'s augmentations, but their lingering effects have given [PAWN_nameDef] an increased immunity from constant exposure to bioweaponry.

BackstoryDef.title: Crypto leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a powerful group that would utilize cryptosleep to see their complex plans to fruition. Unfortunately, unforeseen changes over the past hundred years or so have destroyed the organization [PAWN_nameDef] was once a part of.

BackstoryDef.title: Empire rebel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a group that would use cryptosleep to see the results of their often several hundred year plans. Unforeseen changes over the past century or so have destroyed the group [PAWN_nameDef] was once a part of, but has left [PAWN_objective] with various useful skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Empire rebel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived underground on a planet bombarded with deadly radiation. [PAWN_nameDef] was a hired gun for a powerful underlord, until they were forced to escape as religious fanatics forced people to return to the surface claiming they were the rightful inheritors of the underground. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to repair an abandoned starship and escape the planet, but had to watch [PAWN_possessive] friends and family boil from being exposed to the solar radiation.

BackstoryDef.title: Empire rebel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of an underworld city on a planet bombarded by solar radiation. A band of fanatics deposed [PAWN_objective] and forced the people of the planet to return to the surface to their deaths. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to hide within the complex caverns long enough for the empire to return to the planet and help them escape.

BackstoryDef.title: Draft dodger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was going to be drafted into [PAWN_possessive] country's military. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to avoid the draft by disguising themselves as an elderly citizen while writing literature condemning the war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s work became immensely popular and even after the farce was revealed, [PAWN_pronoun] was referred to as "granny [PAWN_nameDef]".

BackstoryDef.title: Vampire hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled hunter of haemophages on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to kill some of [PAWN_possessive] friends and family who had embraced the curse. The experience left [PAWN_objective] with [PAWN_possessive] own lust for blood.
